CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 3, 1949, pg. 1, reads: "[Illegible Freedom? - Mount Lebanon [ill.] attacked the home of Dr. and Mrs. Benjamin Arshan of 382 Anawanda Avenue [ill.] because the couple entertained a [ill.]  in their home.  Anti-Negro [ill.] have been spattering the house with rotten tomatoes, calling names and threatening harm to the family since the interracial party was held last Thursday.  The sign, charging that the Arshans are Communists, was pasted on the front of their home last Friday. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Stone wall with sign inscribed "Commie Lives Here, 382 Anawanda," at home of Dr. Benjamin Arshan, Mount Lebanon
